ygData.subject: RE: Hunting Grounds
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ok, answered my own question last night.. A. Stone Guardians for my level 17 are blue, but hit hard. B. Stone Guardians have friends. And lots of them.
ygData.messageBody:
> city in the game!) so I'm familiar with Nektulos. I'm
> just curious as to how much of a problem the Stone/Iron
> guards are going to be. Heh

Ok, answered my own question last night..

A. Stone Guardians for my level 17 are blue, but hit hard.
B. Stone Guardians have friends. And lots of them.

It's got to be fairly amusing seeing this little half-elf
in Nektulos kiting 7 stone guardians and a few pesky
skeletons..

Lavastorm was nice, but would be much better with a second
person or even a group. The Fire Imp's and their heat spells
just do too much damage to me. Elemental Rhythms proved to
be useless in my opinion. (Or whichever rhythms is the
fire/cold one - I checked before going, but don't remember
now) Am I doing something wrong? Or are the rhythm songs
only good when you're playing an instrument? (Thus making
them useless while soloing.)
